Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_CONASAT1;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.Spacecraft = CONASAT1;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.Filename = 'CONASAT1_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT1.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
